TopicTitle: My first little VTOL. Amazing result.

Articles.Content:
Some people probably know me as the guy with the perpetual huge part count.

Not this time. I spent 5 minutes building this. 18 Parts. Currently climbing at 8500m. Expected flying time: 1 hour 45 minutes.

I'm amazed.
There's a certain beauty and virtue to simplicity.
If you gave that tilt rotor capabilities then I could imagine it would have a fairly decent cruising speed, then strap a gun on it and your all set.
